summary:
Dartmouth College is a prestigious private university in Hanover, New Hampshire, part of the Ivy League. Founded in 1769, it was originally established to educate Native Americans but later focused on training Congregationalist ministers. Today, it offers a wide range of undergraduate majors and graduate programs in various fields.

Dartmouth is known for its strong undergraduate education, Greek life, and traditions. It has a beautiful campus located above the Connecticut River. The university has a highly selective admissions process and boasts notable alumni, including politicians, Nobel laureates, and Olympic medalists.
title: Dartmouth College
